languages.text: {n}Оглушительный лязг доносится из нутра Дикаря, и состав отчетливо вздрагивает под ногами, словно готов вот-вот рвануть вперед.{/n} "Оу! Осторожнее, Ваша Светлость! Не дайте этому монстру размазать нас о ближайшую стену".

traits.locale_text: {n}Оглушительный лязг доносится из нутра Дикаря, и состав отчетливо вздрагивает под ногами, словно готов вот-вот рвануть вперед.{/n} "Оу! Осторожнее, Ваша Светлость! Не дайте этому монстру размазать нас о ближайшую стену".

languages.text: {n}A deafening clang resounds from Savage's innards, and the train shudders underfoot, as if preparing to leap forward.{/n} "Whoa! Careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Don't let this monster smash us against the nearest wall."
languages.original_text: {n}Оглушительный лязг доносится из нутра Дикаря, и состав отчетливо вздрагивает под ногами, словно готов вот-вот рвануть вперед.{/n} "Оу! Осторожнее, Ваша Светлость! Не дайте этому монстру размазать нас о ближайшую стену".

traits.locale_text: {n}A deafening clang comes from the Savage's innards, and the train shudders underfoot, as if prepared to burst forward.{/n} "Whoa! Careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Do not let this monster smash us against the nearest wall. I am sure he would be all too eager."

{n}A deafening clang comes from the Savage's innards, and the train shudders underfoot, as if prepared to burst forward.{/n} "Whoa! Careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Do not let this monster smash us against the nearest wall. I am sure he would be all too eager."

{n}A deafening clang springs from Savage's innards, and the train shudders underfoot, as if preparing to leap forward.{/n} "Whoa! Careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Don't let this monster smash us against the nearest wall."

{n}A deafening clang springs from Savage's innards, and the train shudders underfoot, as if preparing to leap forward.{/n} "Whoa! Careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Don't let this monster smash us against the nearest wall."

languages.text: {n}Un estruendo metálico resuena en las entrañas de Salvaje y el tren tiembla a tus pies, como si se preparara para saltar.{/n} «¡Hala! ¡Cuidado, mi{mf|lord|lady}! No deje que este monstruo nos aplaste contra la pared más cercana».
languages.original_text: {n}A deafening clang resounds from Savage's innards, and the train shudders underfoot, as if preparing to leap forward.{/n} "Whoa! Careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Don't let this monster smash us against the nearest wall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un estruendo metálico brota de las entrañas de Salvaje y el tren tiembla a tus pies, como si se preparara para saltar.{/n} «¡Hala! ¡Cuidado, mi{mf|lord|lady}! No deje que este monstruo nos aplaste contra la pared más cercana. No necesita que le tienten».

languages.text: {n}耳を潰すような音がサベージの内部から鳴り響き、列車は跳躍の準備をするかのように足元を震わせる。 {/n}「おっと！気をつけてください、陛下！この怪物に近くの壁に叩きつけられないようにしてください」
languages.original_text: {n}A deafening clang resounds from Savage's innards, and the train shudders underfoot, as if preparing to leap forward.{/n} "Whoa! Careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Don't let this monster smash us against the nearest wall."

traits.locale_text: {n}耳を潰すような音がサベージの内部から湧き上がり、列車は跳躍の準備をするかのように足元を震わせる。 {/n}「おっと！気をつけてください、陛下！この怪物が近くの壁にぶつかってくるかもしれません」

languages.text: {n}萨维奇内部发出了震耳欲聋的巨响。列车在你脚下颤抖着，仿佛打算冲出轨道一样。{/n}“哇噢！当心点，大人！可别让这怪物把我们甩到墙上。”
languages.original_text: {n}A deafening clang resounds from Savage's innards, and the train shudders underfoot, as if preparing to leap forward.{/n} "Whoa! Careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Don't let this monster smash us against the nearest wall."

traits.locale_text: {n}萨维奇内部发出了一声震耳欲聋的巨响。列车在你脚下颤抖着，仿佛打算冲出轨道一样。{/n}“哇噢！当心点，大人！可别让这怪物把我们甩到墙上，我敢说它肯定非常想这么干。”

languages.text: {n}Ein ohrenbetäubendes Dröhnen ertönt aus Savages Innereien, und der Zug zittert unter deinen Füßen, als würde er sich auf einen Sprung vorbereiten.{/n} "Hey! Vorsicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Sonst klatscht uns dieses Monster an die nächste Wand."
languages.original_text: {n}A deafening clang resounds from Savage's innards, and the train shudders underfoot, as if preparing to leap forward.{/n} "Whoa! Careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Don't let this monster smash us against the nearest wall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein ohrenbetäubendes Klirren ertönt aus Wilds Innereien, und der Zug zittert unter den Füßen, als würde er sich auf einen Sprung nach vorne vorbereiten.{/n} "Hey! Vorsicht, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Sonst klatscht uns dieses Monster an die nächste Wand. Ich bin sicher, das würde ihm großes Vergnügen bereiten."

languages.text: {n}Un claquement métallique assourdissant s'élève des entrailles de Sauvage et le train se met à vibrer sous vos pieds, comme s'il se préparait à foncer vers l'avant.{/n} « Holà ! Prudence, Votre Seigneurie ! Autrement, ce monstre va nous envoyer valdinguer contre le mur le plus proche. »
languages.original_text: {n}A deafening clang resounds from Savage's innards, and the train shudders underfoot, as if preparing to leap forward.{/n} "Whoa! Careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Don't let this monster smash us against the nearest wall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un claquement métallique assourdissant s'élève des entrailles de Sauvage et le train se met à vibrer sous vos pieds, comme s'il se préparait à foncer droit devant.{/n} « Holà ! Prudence, Votre Seigneurie ! Autrement, ce monstre va nous envoyer valdinguer contre le mur le plus proche. Tel que je le connais, il sautera sur la première occasion. »

languages.text: {n}Hoyrat'ın iç kısımlarından kulakları sağır eden bir çınlama yükseliyor ve tren, ileri sıçramaya hazırlanıyormuşçasına temelden sarsılıyor.{/n} "Aman! Dikkatli olun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Bu canavarın bizi en yakın duvara yapıştırmasına izin vermeyin. Buna pek hevesli olduğuna eminim."
languages.original_text: {n}A deafening clang resounds from Savage's innards, and the train shudders underfoot, as if preparing to leap forward.{/n} "Whoa! Careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Don't let this monster smash us against the nearest wall."
